tier.item: a. Det ble gitt ham ei gave.
There was given him a present. Norwegian (W8)
a. Det ble gitt ham ei gave.
There was given him a present. Norwegian (W8)
Det ble gitt ham ei gave.
There was given him a present.
b. Det erbjöds honom ett nytt jobb.
There was offered him a new job. Swedish (W9)
b. Det erbjöds honom ett nytt jobb.
There was offered him a new job. Swedish (W9)
Det erbjöds honom ett nytt jobb.
There was offered him a new job.

(15) Verbs with dative subjects and nominative objects in Icelandic (M16)
a. Ég tel henni hafa alltaf þótt Ólafur leiðinlegur.
I believe her-Dat to.have always thought Olaf-Nom boring-Nom
`I believe her to have always thought Olaf boring.'

Nino is showing pictures to Gia.
Nino showed the pictures to Gia.
`This house will be built for Ivan.'
`This house will be built for Ivan.'
This house will be built for Ivan.
This house was built for Ivan.
